d = d_pass[3]
pf = build_portfolio(**d)
min_vol_weights = np.array([0.15515521225480033, 2.168404344971009e-18, 
    0.4946241856546514, 0.35022060209054834])
ef_opt_weights = pf.ef_minimum_volatility()
assert np.allclose(ef_opt_weights.values.transpose(), min_vol_weights, atol
    =weak_abse)
